page.title: 11Law and Order
page.content: There is no resident police man in the area, but it is overseen by the resident police man in Gatehouse, 5 miles away. He patrols the village in his van at least once a day, and will see to any crime in the area - which is very infrequent. Once a year the school children take cycling proficiency tests. Much of the work is done in school, but the police come once or twice to instruct the children on the road, sometimes actually taking them for a cycle run, instructing them as they go. Any person who is committed for trial appears before the Sheriff Court at Kirkcudbright.
